original_text: Travellers from Tema look everywhere for these streams. Traders from Sheba hope to find water. Travellers from Tema look everywhere for these streams. Traders from Sheba hope to find water. Travellers from Tema look everywhere for these streams. Traders from Sheba hope to find water. Travellers from Tema look everywhere for these streams.
korean_text: 데마의 떼들이 그것을 바라보고 스바의 행인들도 그것을 사모하다가

sentences.original_text: Travellers from Tema look everywhere for these streams.
sentences.korean_translation: 데마에서 온 여행자들은 이 개울들을 찾으려 곳곳을 둘러본다.

sentences.original_text: Traders from Sheba hope to find water.
sentences.korean_translation: 스바에서 온 상인들은 물을 찾기를 바란다.

sentences.original_text: Travellers from Tema look everywhere for these streams.
